peal.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a sudden loud sound of laughter
peal.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: We could hear peals of laughter coming from the hall.
peal.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: A loud peal of thunder crashed directly overhead.
peal.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the loud ringing sound made by a bell
peal.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: A sudden peal of bells broke the silence.
peal.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a musical pattern made by ringing a number of bells one after the other
peal.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if bells peal, they ring loudly
peal.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The bells pealed out on Christmas Day.
